tool_name: PDF Highlight and Annotation Extraction API
tool_description: Unlock the full potential of your PDF documents with our powerful PDF Highlight and Annotation Extraction API. With just a few lines of code, you can easily extract all the highlighted and annotated text from any PDF document. This API is perfect for document analysis, text mining, and other applications that require access to PDF highlights and annotations. It's easy to use, fast, and supports a wide range of PDF formats. Monetize your application by subscribing to our API and access it thro...
title: PDF Highlight and Annotation Extraction API

api_list.name: healthy_condition__get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdf-highlight-and-annotation-extraction-api.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdf-highlight-and-annotation-extraction-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
